synthesis_conditions.crystallization_method: Layering with i-propylether in 1:4 volume ratio
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: Attempts to crystallize the monoligand complex 1Zn2+ failed, proving the high stability of the duplex structure 12Zn2+.

synthesis_conditions.crystallization_method: Layering with i-propylether in 1:4 volume ratio
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: Crystals formed also within minutes from solutions.

synthesis_conditions.crystallization_method: Layering with i-propylether in 1:4 volume ratio
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: Due to the paramagnetism of the copper cation, no conclusive NMR spectra could be recorded.

synthesis_conditions.crystallization_method: Layering with i-propylether in 1:4 volume ratio
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: NMR spectra shows indistinguishable broad peaks due to fast ligand exchange.
Crystal structure has been reported and described in a previous paper.
